alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:12AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, north central Dodge, southeastern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1112 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near District Path, or 8 miles south of Jeffersonville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Cochran, Jeffersonville, Chester, Dexter, Dudley, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Coley Station, Tarversville, Yonkers, Magnolia, Rowland, Royal, District Path, Harlow, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, and Rebie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
